titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 1) to approve the Keystone XL Pipeline, and providing for proceedings during the period from February 16, 2015, through February 23, 2015.
Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 1) to approve the Keystone XL Pipeline, and providing for proceedings during the period from February 16, 2015, through February 23, 2015.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-22, by Mr. Woodall.

After disposition of the previous question, the resolution allows for one motion to commit during consideration of S. 1. The resolution also provides for proceedings during the period from Feb. 16, 2015 through Feb. 23, 2015.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 8.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 100.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 242 - 183 (Roll no. 71).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 248 - 177 (Roll no. 72).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (S. 1) to approve the Keystone XL Pipeline, and providing for proceedings during the period from February 16, 2015, through February 23, 2015.
